text: movun (deviyan yayi) aradhana karana dæyada (taman venuven) tamange deviyan veta mædihat vi kata kirimata (deviyan veta) samipava sitinne kavarekdæyi yanna soyagena, ohuge dayavama balaporottuven sitimin, ohuge danduvamatada biya vannaha. mandayat niyata vasayenma obage deviyange danduvama nam, itamat biya vannata yutu ekaki
